name: cordova-plugin-uiwebview-engine-test-ios
description: iOS Unit Tests for cordova-plugin-uiwebview-engine Plugin
author: Bertrand Presles

scripts.test: xcodebuild test -workspace BPRUIWebViewEngineTest.xcworkspace -scheme BPRUIWebViewEngineLibTests -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5' -xcconfig test.xcconfig
